questions.title:
You're planning a night out.
Which option sounds more fun?

answers.text: Going out with a group of friends. The more people, the more energy you feel.
Dinner with your best friend — just the two of you — and sharing what's on your mind

questions.title:
If you were forced to chose one,
which would you choose?

answers.text: A weekend with zero social plans
A weekend packed with social plans

questions.title: As a student, would you rather...
In general, after attending a large party or networking event, how do you feel?

answers.text: Tired and drained, even if I had fun

questions.title:
You've just met someone new.
How would they describe you?

In general, which statement
is most true for you?

answers.text: I don't mind multi-tasking, and I often do it.
I like to focus deeply on one thing at a time rather than jump from task to task.
